set.description: List of uuid of master nodes
List of uuid of worker nodes. Required if allow_workloads_on_master is false

bool.description: If the master nodes can run non-critical workloads

string.description: If master_vip_ipv4 is specified, this field is required. Specify the interface that the VIP attaches to
IP of master node
API server Virtual IP that provides failover. When specified, deploy keepalived setup to cluster master nodes together
Optional DNS name for API endpoint. This field is autogenerated when usePf9Domain is set, also applicable for manual deploy
CIDR used for pod IP addresses, applicable also for manual deploy
CIDR used for service IP addresses, applicable also for manual deploy
Corresponds to the CALICO_NODE_CPU_LIMIT environment variable in Calico.
Corresponds to the CALICO_NODE_MEMORY_LIMIT environment variable in Calico.
Corresponds to the CALICO_TYPHA_CPU_LIMIT environment variable in Calico.
Corresponds to the CALICO_TYPHA_MEMORY_LIMIT environment variable in Calico.
Corresponds to the CALICO_CONTROLLER_CPU_LIMIT environment variable in Calico.
Corresponds to the CALICO_CONTROLLER_MEMORY_LIMIT environment variable in Calico.

bool.description: True if cluster runs privileged containers
If set to true nodes will be registered in the cluster using hostname instead of IP address. This option is only applicable to IPv4 hosts.

string.description: Method to detect the interface
Name of the interface
kube role version to be used when bringing up the cluster.
kube role version to which the cluster can be upgraded.

int64.description: Percentage of nodes to upgrade at a time during a batch upgrade. If this attribute is omitted then nodes will be sequentially upgraded, one after the other.

string.description: options: none, static; default: none
options: none, best-effort, restricted, single-numa-node; default: none
Enter a comma separated list of CPUs to be reserved for the system,example:4-8,9-12
IP-IP encapsulation mode for Calico network. Choose: Always, Never, CrossSubnet
Method to detect the IPv4 address

bool.description: Field is set to true if Calico nodes need to NAT north-south egress traffic.

string.description: Subnet size per node for the Calico network, in CIDR notation (e.g. 26)

int64.description: MTU for container network interfaces. Optional and used for the Calico network backend

string.description: Network backend to use for container networking. Defaults to flannel. Supported choices are flannel, calico
A set of key=value pairs that enable or disable built-in APIs.

list.description: List of supported kube-apiserver flags, example: --request-timeout=2m0s,--kubelet-timeout=20s
List of supported scheduler flags, example: --kube-api-burst=120,--log_file_max_size=3000
List of supported controller manager flags, example: --large-cluster-size-threshold=60,--concurrent-statefulset-syncs=10

string.description: Container runtime used by this cluster

int64.description: Number of hours before user certificates in kubeconfig expires, should be greater than 0 if set

string.description: Timestamp for daily backup, specified in format 'HH:MM'

custom.schema_definition: stringvalidator.RegexMatches(regexp.MustCompile(`^(?:[0-1][0-9]|2[0-3]):[0-5][0-9]$`), "Must be a valid time in HH:MM format")

int64.description: Maximum number of backups to retain for timestamped backups.

string.description: The interval at which etcd backups should be taken, specified in duration strings such as '2h' or '3m'. Note that composite duration strings like '2h3m' are not allowed.
Path on the local filesystem where the etcd backup should be stored. For 'local' storage type only.
Storage type for the etcd backup. Only 'local' is current supported type. 'local' saves backup to the node's local disk

map.description: User defined key-value pairs represented as a JSON object

string.description: Time at which the cluster was created
Virtual router ID of the master VIP

int64.description: Port on which the Kubernetes API server is running

bool.description: Field is set to true if the cluster is masterless

string.description: Optional. UUID of the node pool used for the cluster. Defaults to the first node pool of the local cloud provider type

UUID of the cloud provider

Name of the attribute on which this filter is applied
Placeholder for an ID

list.description: A list of cluster IDs for clusters that match all the specified filters.

list_nested.description: List of filters, each filter is applied to the list of clusters one by one. Hence the results match all the specified filters. All the filters are ANDed.

string.description: Name of the attribute on which this filter should be applied. The tags attribute is a special case where the name has to be specified as 'tags:<tag_key>'

set.description: Set of values for the attribute, if any of the 'value' matches then the filter is considered to be matched
Set of regexes to match to the attribute value, if any of the 'regex' matches then the filter is considered to be matched
